name: Trivia King
description: Have fun challenging yourself in Trivia King or challenge friends and family with you in Party Mode! Includes Your 8 Favorite Categories. High Quality Graphics. Party Mode (2-4 players locally). Gamepad Support. Family Friendly. Fun for all ages. So what are you waiting for? Prove you're the King of Trivia! (disclaimer: or Queen!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
